header.h4: Welcome To Nexus's Interactive Getting Started Guide!

body.p: In this guide, you will be learning how to use Nexus with some demos provided in this Guide

footer.small: If you already know how to use Nexus, click here to skip this guide.

header.h4: Selecting A Theme For Your Character

body.p: In order to make a character in Nexus, you need to select a theme in order to get started.

footer.small: Already made a character? click here to go to the theme selection for the lvm.

body.p: After you select a theme. the CC from 2016 will load the theme you selected. below you can use it to create your first character.

footer.small: Already made a character? click here to go to the theme selection for the lvm.

body.p: You character has been saved successfully! Click on the Next button to continue to the next step.

header.h4: Selecting A Theme For Your Video

body.p: In order to make a video in Nexus, you need to select a theme in order to get started.

footer.small: If you have already made a video in Nexus, you may click here to move on to the Video Management step.
footer.h6: Want to make characters? click here to go to the theme selection for the cc.

body.p: After you select a theme. the LVM from 2016 will load the theme you selected. below you can use it to create your first video.

footer.small: If you have already made a video in Nexus, you may click here to move on to the Video Management step.
footer.h6: Want to make characters? click here to go to the theme selection for the cc.

body.p: After you make your video, the LVP from 2016 will load the video you made. below you may view your video and make any changes you need to make before moving on with the next step.

At some point you may need to manage your videos in Nexus. Don't know how? this step provides everything you need to know about Video Management. below are your videos and their actions. Try using one of the actions to see what happens.
